function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited studies on the influence of climate parameters on the spread of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of environmental factors contributing to virus spread","Mitigation":"Conduct more extensive research on the influence of climate parameters on virus spread","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for studying environmental factors","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Coronavirus can retain infectivity in low temperature and low humidity environment for up to 2 weeks","Impact":"Facilitation of virus transmission in subtropical climates","Mitigation":"Implement effective ventilation and air circulation systems, and maintain higher indoor humidity levels","Technologies":"HVAC systems, humidifiers, air purifiers","People":"Community members in subtropical climates","Owner":"Government agencies, building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Divergence in literature about the effects of temperature and humidity on the viability and transmissibility of the coronavirus","Impact":"Uncertainty regarding the influence of weather conditions on virus viability and transmissibility","Mitigation":"Foster collaboration and knowledge sharing among researchers and experts to reach consensus","Technologies":"Collaborative research platforms, data sharing tools","People":"Research community, public health officials","Owner":"International health organizations, research institutions"}]}
